entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape appeared at the dungeon door and scolded Harry, Ron, and Neville for fighting.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry was wrestling with Neville when Snape intervened.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron was also involved in the fight and received a warning from Snape.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville was fighting with Harry when Snape intervened.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: The Gryffindor line was being scolded by Snape for their behavior.

entities.name: st. mungo's
entities.description: Neville is highly distressed by the subject of people in St. Mungo's due to magical damage to their brains.

relationships.description: Snape scolded the Gryffindor line for fighting.
Harry was wrestling with Neville when Snape intervened.
Ron was also involved in the fight and received a warning from Snape.
Neville is highly distressed by the subject of people in St. Mungo's due to magical damage to their brains.
